sourceMeaningMnemonic: When <radical>winter</radical> comes your <radical>direction</radical>, the trees must <kanji>release</kanji> their leaves for the coming cold.
meaningInfo: Picture winter heading straight for you and frosting everything over. Now picture the leaves being released by the trees.
readingMnemonic: The trees <kanji>release</kanji> all of their leaves onto your <reading>ho</reading>me (<ja>ほう</ja>). Slowly, you watch in horror as your home is consumed by the released leaves. They enter in through the windows, doors, and the chimney.
readingInfo: "Release my home from this leaf prison!" you shout at the now bare trees.
